body_html: Any article on managed memory will tell you that it has performance implications. Here is a good one: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/21986542/is-cudamallocmanaged-slower-than-cudamalloc. Managed memory comes with extra machinery to automatically copy pages between host and device memory on page-faults. Since we manually allocate and copy memory between host and device everywhere, this change will be additional overhead with no gain in productivity.
